meanings.definition: Expertise: expert skill or knowledge in a particular area
meanings.sent1: Her expertise in painting allowed her to create beautiful artworks.
meanings.sent2: His expertise in cooking made him a sought-after chef in the city.
meanings.sent3: Despite his expertise in gardening, he couldn't keep a cactus alive.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in photography was like a magic lens capturing moments perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon's expertise in surgery saved many lives.

meanings.definition: Expertise: the quality of being an expert
meanings.sent1: The professor's expertise in physics was unmatched in the university.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated her expertise in leadership by guiding the team to success.
meanings.sent3: His expertise in sleeping was so impressive, he could do it anywhere.
meanings.sent4: The detective's expertise in solving mysteries was akin to Sherlock Holmes.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's expertise in running was evident in every stride.
